subject: Self Care
title: Stress and Muscle Tension
description: A fast breakdown of Stress and Muscle Tension for builders.

hook.text: Your shoulders are touching your ears right now. You didn't notice until you read this sentence.

buildup.text: Under stress, muscles tense involuntarily to brace for impact. The body prepares for a blow constantly.

discovery.text: Chronic tension causes headaches, jaw pain, back pain, and neck stiffness. Muscles never fully relax.

twist.text: Many people treat the pain with pills but never address the stress. The tension returns every time.

climax.text: Progressive muscle relaxation â€” tensing then releasing each group â€” teaches the body to let go.

punchline.text: Drop your shoulders. Unclench your jaw. Start now.

quiz.question: What causes chronic muscle tension?
options: Stress keeps muscles braced for impact constantly
